pull_requests.title: BIP324: Fix features bitmask for decoding-case selection
pull_requests.body:
Supersedes https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1969.
On top of https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1969.

I'm one of the authors of BIP324 but let's wait for an ACK from @sipa, please.

comment_list.body: ACK code changes; I did not verify the generated output.
